Description: Selection number of vehicle/scenario
Name of the selected scenario/vehicle
Current year or Vehicle Model Year
Number of years to calculate TCO for - generally the expected life of the vehicle in years

Choose TCO Calculation method between 'DIRECT' and 'EFFICIENCY'. 'DIRECT' method uses scenario.downtime_oppy_cost_dol_per_hr to estimate downtime opportunity costs while 'EFFICIENCY' method uses a time-based efficiency value to implicitly include downtime opportunity costs in the discounted_tco_dol. Defaults to 'DIRECT' if left blank.
List of dictionary of TCOCalc objects for each year of calculations. TCOCalc objects contain yearly total costs, and cost components for CapitalCosts, OperatingCosts, and OpportunityCosts
Discounted Total Capital Costs - Contains MSRP and Tax or Purchasing Downpayment. It is discounted for zero years, effectively not discounted due to the cost occuring during the start of lifecycle.
Discounted Total Operating Costs in dollars - Sum of discounted values of fuel expense, maintenance, insurance, purchasing, and fueling dwell labor
Discounted Total Opportunity Costs in dollars- sum of discounted values of lost payload capacity cost, fueling dwell opportunity cost, and maintenance & repair downtime opportunity cost

Discounted total cost of ownership in dollars - calculated based on config.tco_method. For DIRECT method, it is the sum of discounted capital costs, operating costs, and opportunity costs per year. For EFFICIENCY method, it is estimated by taking productivity or value of downtime instead of adding downtime opportunity costs

Full Form: Cumulative Discounted Total Cost of Ownership
Description: Cumulative sum of discounted TCO per year in dollars presented as a vector of length=vehicle_life_yr

Full Form: Cumulative Total Cost of Ownership Per Mile
Description: Cumulative discounted TCO in dollars divided by cumulative vmt presented as a vector of length=vehicle_life_yr

Full Form: Cumulative Levelized Total Cost of Ownership Per Mile
Description: Cumulative discounted TCO in dollars divided by cumulative discounted VMT presented as a vector of length=vehicle_life_yr
Sum of Vehicle Miles Traveled (scenario.vmt) for all years in vehicle_life_yr
Sum of scenario.vmt discounted at the rate of scenario.discount_rate_pct_per_yr
Estimated glider component cost in dollars - contributes to MSRP
Estimated fuel converter component cost in dollars - contributes to MSRP
Estimated fuel storage component cost in dollars - contributes to MSRP
Estimated motor and power electronics component cost in dollars - contributes to MSRP
Estimated plugin charger component cost in dollars - contributes to MSRP
Estimated battery/ESS component cost in dollars - contributes to MSRP
Estimated purchased/excise tax  in dollars - calculated from MSRP
Estimated manufacturer's suggested retail price in dollars - calculated from vehicle component costs

Estimated purchasing downpayment in dollars. For loan or lease, it is calculated from scenario.purchasing_downpayment_pct and mrsp_total_dol+purchase_tax. For cash method, it is equal to mrsp_total_dol+purchase_tax
Estimated residual cost of vehicle in dollars (residual value is the negative of residual cost)
Estimated fuel operating cost in dollars - calculated from energy consumption and fuel prices
Estimated maintenance operating cost in dollars - calculated from VMT and scenario.maint_oper_cost_dol_per_mi
Estimated purchasing cost - additional payments due to interest or rent fee for loan and lease methods respectively
Estimated insurance cost of vehicle in dollars - estimated from MSRP and scenario.insurance_rates_pct_per_yr
Estimated labor cost incurred during fueling/charging dwell time
Lost payload capacity opportunity cost in dollars - estimated from payload_cap_cost_multiplier and estimated tco
Estimated opportunity cost associated with fueling/charging dwell time
Estimated labor cost incurred during maintenance & repair downtime
Estimated discounted opportunity cost for both fueling dwell time and M&R downtime in dollars - estimation is based on config.TCO_method

Full Form: Total Fuel Used Gallon Gasoline Equivalent
Description: Estimated total fuel used in gallons gasoline equivalent - estimated from energy efficiency and distance traveled

Full Form: Total Fuel Used Gallon Diesel Equivalent
Description: Estimated total fuel used in diesels gasoline equivalent - estimated from energy efficiency and distance traveled
Miles per Gallon of Gasoline Equivalent - from drivecycle simulation
Miles per Gallon of Gasoline Equivalent effect to grid - mpgge times charger efficiency
Miles per Gallon of Diesel Equivalent - from drivecycle simulation
Energy spent per mile of operation - estimated from drivecycle simulation

Lost payload capacity opportunity cost factor - represents the fractionally extra vehicle required to compensate for reduced payload capacity compared to conventional vehicle - Currently only for Class 8 vehicles
Total dwell time of vehicle due to fueling/charging - used to estimate downtime opportunity cost
Total dwell time of vehicle due to maintenance & repair (planned, unplanned, and tire replacement) - used to estimate downtime opportunity cost
Total downtime due to fueling/charging and maintenance events
